content: प्रतिमुच् {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To free, liberate, release, set free; गृहीतप्रतिमुक्तस्य <ls>R. 4. 43</ls>; अप्तुं तुरंगं प्रतिमोक्तुसर्हसि <ls n="R.">3. 46.</ls> {@--2@} To put on, wear, accoutre or arm oneself with. {@--3@} To quit, leave, abandon. {@--4@} To throw, cast, or discharge at. {@--5@} To pay off (a debt.). {@--6@} To return, restore. {@--7@} To fasten, bind. {@--8@} To assume a form. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To liberate, release. {@--2@} To rescue, save, deliver.
